targets.query: SELECT mean("cpucore") FROM "localhost.load" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT mean("min1") FROM "localhost.load" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("min5") FROM "localhost.load" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("min15") FROM "localhost.load" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("total") FROM "localhost.processcount" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT mean("user") FROM "localhost.cpu" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("system") FROM "localhost.cpu" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("iowait") FROM "localhost.cpu" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("used") FROM "localhost.mem" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT mean("total") FROM "localhost.mem" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT mean("$interface.rx")/mean("$interface.time_since_update")*8 FROM "localhost.network" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(none)
SELECT mean("$interface.tx")/mean("$interface.time_since_update")*8*-1 FROM "localhost.network" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(none)
SELECT mean("used") FROM "localhost.memswap" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT mean("total") FROM "localhost.memswap" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT mean("$disk.read_bytes")/mean("$disk.time_since_update") FROM "localhost.diskio" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT mean("$disk.write_bytes")/mean("$disk.time_since_update") FROM "localhost.diskio" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT mean("/.used") FROM "localhost.fs" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("/.size") FROM "localhost.fs" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("/.percent") FROM "localhost.fs" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT mean("/boot/efi.percent") FROM "localhost.fs" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT mean("$container.cpu_percent") FROM "localhost.docker" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT mean("$container.memory_usage") FROM "localhost.docker" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT mean("user") FROM "localhost.cpu" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT min("user") FROM "localhost.cpu" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT max("user") FROM "localhost.cpu" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT mean("system") FROM "localhost.cpu" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT min("system") FROM "localhost.cpu" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT max("system") FROM "localhost.cpu" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT mean("iowait") FROM "localhost.cpu" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT min("iowait") FROM "localhost.cpu" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT max("iowait") FROM "localhost.cpu" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT mean("ctx_switches") / mean("time_since_update") FROM "localhost.cpu" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT mean("interrupts") / mean("time_since_update") FROM "localhost.cpu" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)

list.name: container
list.query: show field keys on glances from "$host.docker"

list.name: interface
list.query: show field keys on glances from "$host.network"

list.name: disk
list.query: show field keys on glances from "$host.diskio"
